thread.title_full: Leave my daughter alone- Bisola’s baby daddy cries out ▷ NAIJ.COM

author: Sola Bodunrin
title: Leave my daughter alone- Bisola’s baby daddy cries out ▷ NAIJ.COM
text: - Being in Big Brother Naija house has unravel Bisola's baby daddy and her daughter - The baby daddy is pleading that his daughter should be left out of the BBNaija's drama - Bisola and Thin Tall Tony are caught under the sheet in the house Leave my daughter alone- Bisola’s baby daddy cries out Big Brother Naija housemate, Bisola’s baby daddy, Olanrewaju Malcolm, has called on Nigerians to leave his daughter out of BBNaija’s gist. Sharing a love-up photo of him and their 7 year old daughter he pleaded that the child should be left out of her mother’s personal life. Sharing the above photo he captioned it:
